ygData.subject: Re: Breaking, entering, and Attempted Murder
ygData.msgSnippet: That is enough. All posts with Skulletron s escape and replies to it are now VOID! Dcoburn, your post was extreme moding. 1. You didn t let any Maximals

That is enough. All posts with Skulletron's escape and replies to it 
are now VOID!

Dcoburn, your post was extreme moding.
  1. You didn't let any Maximals respond before getting away from one 
of the most secure bases on the planet IN ONE POST! There are 
autodefences inside and outside the ship, and you have to let 
everyone respond to an escaping prisoner.
  2. You went from the Cybertronian Fire to the Alliance base in ONE 
POST. The Cybertronian Fire is very far away, especially on foot. 

If I see another post like this, I will moderate the sender without 
warning. This might seem a bit harsh, but I've just failed an English 
test and am not in the mood to enforce the f***ing rules.

Also, now that posts like this are starting to come in, I'm going to 
focus harder on the 'letting people reply' rule. Things like breaking 
into/out of a base, or shooting through a 20 foot thick wall, are 
just irrational to do it in one post, SO DON'T DO THEM! This is a 
rule, and has been a rule for a long time now, but lately people have 
been breaking it.

This really is nothing new, just RP well and let the people involved 
reply. Just like it has been for the last year or so in this RPG.



And, Alloran, Soundwave wasn't killed for parts, its just that events 
turned out this way, and his body happens to be in the lab.
